definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Bean sprouts & water convolvulus can be scalded if you do not prefer their raw taste.
sentences.chinese: 如果不喜欢生吃芽菜和通菜，便要先灼熟。

definition: variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
choy sum/Chinese flowering cabbage/stem of any Chinese cabbage
water spinach/ong choy/swamp cabbage/water convolvulus/water morning-glory/Ipomoea aquatica (botany)
bok choy/Shanghai pak choy/Chinese mustard (Brassica rapa Chinensis)
